right.text: and someone... someone pulled me out of that dark and firey hole

left.text: but then... something opened up above me and light poured through... and a hand reached down and i grabbed onto it

right.text: and he told me that it wasnt my time and that he loved me and had a plan for me, and that i was getting another chance

left.text: i coudlnt see his face, but it was just pure light
and oh boy, am i going to make the most of it!
